UPDATE_NOTES: Due to container limitations, it cannot be updated from itself.
You can update it manually or for example from Portainer.
Detailed instructions are available on GitHub.

CARD.DELETE_CONFIRM: Do you want to delete this host?

HELP.LABEL: Help
HELP.TEXT: Most of the settings are passed directly as python-on-whales library parameters. Click the button below to view their description.
HELP.TEXT_2: For a local docker socket, just the name will be enough.

EXTRA.LABEL: Extra
EXTRA.CLIENT_CALL_PLACEHOLDER: List e.g. ['docker'], press enter to add item

TABLE.NAME: Name
TABLE.CHECK_HINT: Periodically check for a new image.
TABLE.UPDATE_HINT: Automatically update container when a new image is detected.
TABLE.MAIN_BTN_HINT: If a container is a part of a compose project, all project's containers will be involved in the process.

TABLE.PRUNE_CONFIRM: Do you want to prune images?

CRONTAB_EXPR.LABEL: Crontab expression
CRONTAB_EXPR.HINT:
Crontab expression for periodic checks e.g. 
'0 */1 * * *' for every hour

Click for more info.

NOTIFICATION_URL.LABEL: Notification URL
NOTIFICATION_URL.HINT:
URL for notifications via Apprise e.g. tgram://<token>/<chat_id>

Click for more info.

TIMEZONE.LABEL: Timezone
TIMEZONE.HINT: Timezone in IANA format, e.g. Europe/Moscow

DOCKER_TIMEOUT.LABEL: Docker timeout
DOCKER_TIMEOUT.HINT: Docker CLI call timeout. This applies primarily to API methods and does not apply to, for example, container re-creation or image pulling.

OIDC_ENABLED.LABEL: Enable OIDC Authentication
OIDC_ENABLED.HINT: Enable OpenID Connect authentication alongside password authentication

OIDC_WELL_KNOWN_URL.LABEL: OIDC Well-Known URL
OIDC_WELL_KNOWN_URL.HINT: The well-known configuration URL of your OIDC provider (e.g., https://auth.example.com/.well-known/openid_configuration)

OIDC_CLIENT_ID.LABEL: OIDC Client ID
OIDC_CLIENT_ID.HINT: The client identifier registered with your OIDC provider

OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET.LABEL: OIDC Client Secret
OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET.HINT: The client secret for your OIDC application (keep this secure)

OIDC_REDIRECT_URI.LABEL: OIDC Redirect URI
OIDC_REDIRECT_URI.HINT: The redirect URI configured in your OIDC provider (e.g., https://tugtainer.example.com/auth/oidc/callback)

OIDC_SCOPES.LABEL: OIDC Scopes
OIDC_SCOPES.HINT: Space-separated list of OAuth2 scopes to request (openid is always included)

OIDC.NAME: Name
OIDC.REDIRECT_SETUP_MESSAGE: In your OIDC provider, you must register this exact redirect URI as an allowed callback URL:
